author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Watch: Kimmel lets rip at Justin Theroux for telling everyone he cried at their wedding
text:
It's true. It's the only thing Justin Theroux did spill about his very private wedding to Jennifer Aniston - over which a reportedly blubbing Kimmel officiated. A few weeks back, while making an appearance on Good Morning America , Theroux offered the below nugget when asked about his recent nuptials.
"It was exactly what you would want him to do. He was extremely funny, kept things extremely light, was extremely touching... He cried a little bit. He did. And then...everyone did. And it was just... it was the perfect tone for the night."
In short, Jimmy ain't pleased.
Then again... Jimmy did "bully" him into having a Bachelor Party. In short, it involved eating steaks with Jimmy Kimmel's wife a baby. And then Billy Crudup fell asleep on the couch.
MORE: Watch: Justin Theroux says Jimmy Kimmel cried while officiating wedding to Jennifer Aniston
MORE: Watch: Justin Theroux admits why keeping his wedding to Jennifer Aniston secret was a terrible idea
MORE: Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux have FINALLY gotten married
